WRITING.TITLE: Named Brands/Drinks and copyright infringement.
WRITING.TEXT: If I upload a youtube video of myself playing games. And in that video I have a drink of Monster or Red Bull whilst wearing a nike t-shirt or something like that, will it get removed for violation of copyright by any chance???

This is everything you'll ever need to know about the Squat. If you ever have a Q about Squats/Deadlifts or Bench, look up Mark Rippetoe. Here is the squat explanation - http://www.t-nation.com/training/squat-mechanics-a-deep-analysis

AK12 RIP with Grip + Extended mags = wow.
I love the weapon, but I find I need to use it when I'm placing myself strategically around the map.
I love play Gung-Ho, and that's when I use the ASM1.

Camp against a wall, and just aim. lol
Or, you could just strategically place yourself around the map so you're only running along alleys or through certain parts. Instead of being central of the map, where you're open to the enemies sight, try to manouvre yourself around the edges of the map, always being ready to fire as you turn a corner.
Have QuickDraw and Grip as two attachments as a standard :) that's what I do, and I'm not too shabby.
Breakneck? How comes? I would have thought the Genuine was the best KF5 Variant. Accuracy and Damage both +1 and -1 Range.
I remember the MP5... oh ma lord it was just TOO good.

Okay lovely, I'm defo going to try out the EM1 hip fire.... :)
I really want the one with a pink laser, that one is supposedly DEADLY.
It's just not that good of a gun though is it? Every time I use it, I find that I can never go on streaks like I do with the KF5, or the ASM1, or the HBRA3
